data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Boavista.
Boavista drive upfield and Alberto Bueno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rio Ave defender.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Porto Rio Ave attack through Mehdi Taremi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Boavista have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Manuel Oliveira awards Boavista a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Boavista's Gustavo Sauer is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 16, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
In the minute 17, Rio Ave's Diego Lopes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Boavista defender.
Mehdi Taremi scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nelson Monte for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Boavista.
In the minute 23, Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Manuel Oliveira signals a Boavista throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 27, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Gustavo Sauer of Boavista gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 27, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rio Ave drives forward and Mehdi Taremi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Boavista.
In the minute 29, Al Musrati for Rio Ave gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Boavista's Yaw Ackah gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Mateus for Boavista is whistled offside.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 34, Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Boavista's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Porto.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 36, Manuel Oliveira awards Boavista a goal kick.
Throw-in Boavista.
Boavista are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Free kick Rio Ave.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 43, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Free kick Boavista.
Boavista's Ricardo Costa breaks free at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Boavista.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gustavo Sauer (Boavista) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 52, Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Manuel Oliveira signals a Boavista throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Boavista.
In the minute 56, Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave drive forward but Nelson Monte is judged offside.
Gustavo Sauer (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Boavista's Gustavo Sauer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Rio Ave pushes forward through Mehdi Taremi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 65, Cassiano (Boavista) has received a first yellow card.
Manuel Oliveira awards Boavista a goal kick.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 70, Rio Ave needs to be cautious. Boavista have an attacking throw-in.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team have replaced Mateus with Fernando Cardozo. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Matheus Reis is booked for the away team.
In the minute 74, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 75, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Boavista's Ricardo Costa has been booked in Porto.
In the minute 77, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 79, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Carlos Carvalhal (Rio Ave) is making a first substitution, with Carlos Mane replacing Lucas Piazon.
Boavista's Cassiano has run offside.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Carraca with Luis Santos.
Rio Ave take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Mehdi Taremi.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Marlon replacing Ricardo Costa.
Miguel Reisinho is on a sub for Yaw Ackah for Boavista.
In the minute 87, Manuel Oliveira signals a Boavista throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Boavista push forward at Estadio do Bessa XXI and Miguel Reisinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rio Ave defence.
In the minute 88, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Nuno Santos for Rio Ave drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 89, Filipe Augusto (Rio Ave) has received a yellow card from Manuel Oliveira.
Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Boavista.
Boavista's Cassiano gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Rio Ave make their second substitution with Tarantini replacing Diego Lopes.
Pedro Amaral is replacing Nuno Santos for the away team.
